content:
1. What are your plans after the grant is completed?
After the grant is completed, we plan to continue organizing community events, workshops, and talks to further promote the Ethereum ecosystem and its potential in Mexico. We aim to strengthen our network of builders, developers, and enthusiasts and create more opportunities for collaboration and knowledge sharing. We also plan to continue our partnership with the Ethereum Foundation and explore additional funding opportunities to support our community-building efforts.
1. How do you aim to be sustainable after the grant? Alternatively, tell us why this project doesn’t need to be sustainable!
To be sustainable after the grant, we plan to explore additional funding opportunities and revenue streams to support our ongoing community-building efforts. We aim to build long-lasting partnerships with other organizations and individuals who share our values and vision for the Ethereum ecosystem in Mexico. Additionally, we plan to establish a self-sustaining community that can continue to grow and thrive without relying solely on external funding. Finally, we believe that our project is sustainable in its own right because it is focused on community building and education, which will have long-term benefits for the Ethereum ecosystem in Mexico. By fostering a strong community of builders, developers, and enthusiasts, we believe that we can contribute to the growth and development of the Ethereum ecosystem in a sustainable and meaningful way.
